Explore The<br class="d-none d-block-md"/>
History Of Glozin's Store

In the 15th century, the concept of fashion retail began with general stores that offered a range of goods,<br class="d-none d-block-md"/> including clothing. Glozin stores typically catered to local communities and provided essential garments<br class="d-none d-block-md"/> such as basic dresses, shirts, and workwear.

settings.title: Unmatched design—superior performance and customer satisfaction in one.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 1975s / Glimo Founding:
timeline.description: Glozin was founded in 1975 by Blueskytechco in La Coruña, Spain. Initially, the store was named "Glima" but so that progress is user-oriented, it was later renamed Glozin.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 1980s / Unique Business Model:
timeline.description: During the 1980s, Glozin expanded its retail presence within Spain. It developed a unique business model that focused on reducing the time between design and product availability. Glozin pioneered the concept of "fast fashion".

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 1990s / International Expansion:
timeline.description: Glozin ventured beyond Spain and began its international expansion in the early 1990s. It opened stores in Portugal, the United States, Mexico, Greece, France,... Marked the beginning of Glozin's global presence.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 2000s / Continued Growth:
timeline.description: In the early 2000s, Glozin experienced significant growth and became part of the Uza Group, a Spanish multinational fashion company founded by Blueskytechco. Uza is the parent company of several fashion brands and Glozin is its flagship brand.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 2010s / Strong Development of E-commerce:
timeline.description: In the 2010s, Glozin embraced the digital era by expanding its online presence and launching e-commerce platforms. Customers could now shop for Glimo products from the comfort of their homes, further increasing the brand's accessibility and global reach.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 2020s / For the green Environment:
timeline.description: During the 1980s, Glozin expanded its retail presence within Spain. It developed a unique business model that focused on reducing the time between design and product availability. Glozin pioneered the concept of "fast fashion".

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 2023s / Continued Innovation:
timeline.description: Glozin's history is characterized by its ability to combine fast-fashion strategies, market responsiveness, and global expansion to establish itself as a prominent player in the fashion industry.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: Present / Global Influence:
timeline.description: Glozin’s has expanded its retail footprint to over 7.500 stores in more than 90 countries, making it one of the largest and most influential fashion retailers worldwide.

timeline.subtitle: Subtitle
timeline.title: 2030s / IPO launch:
timeline.description: We are starting the long-term corporate fundraising, preparing to complete and test the IPO. Create opportunities for employees to own shares, create motivation and commitment to accompany the company.
